website_summaries.verdict: High-level students and professionals alike will enjoy this responsive, wood-bodied instrument.
pros: Professional model with consistent tone and intonation
Grenadilla wood body with silver-plated key work.Cylindrical bore allows ease of blowing
Comes with 4c mouthpiece, case, and care accessories
cons: You may wish to get a more substantial case to protect your instrument

customer_reviews.title: Extraordinary service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Yamaha YCL-650 clarinet based on Amazon reviews and have been ecstatic with my choice. The original estimated delivery date seemed extended and, on inquiry, I was told the instrument had already been shipped from Japan. It arrived in the most beautiful packaging a mere several days later. It was wrapped like a priceless antique and the instrument inside was equally a treasure. It is so lovely that I look forward to practicing each evening and anticipate many years of dedication to justify its craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Jon H. Lischke

customer_reviews.title: feel and sound is so much better.
customer_reviews.text: Yahama...as always...perfection. I'll take Yahama over Buffet any day of the week. The looks, feel and sound is so much better.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Sounds
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful instrument. I hadn't played in years, but bought this for a hobby during quarantine, and the sound is amazing. If it sounds this good for me; I can't imagine how nicely it would play for a professional.
customer_reviews.author: brian hassett

customer_reviews.title: No serial number but sounds good.
customer_reviews.text: Clarinet sounds good and arrived on schedule. Upon inspection i noticed that the instrument has no serial number which seems odd as all of my other clarinet do
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the clarinet has a very nice sound. I always ask him to play in ...
customer_reviews.text: My son can now hit the notes that he cannot before; the clarinet has a very nice sound. I always ask him to play in this clarinet because I like the sound that comes out from it.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful instrument. Had to make adjustments to some of ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful instrument. Had to make adjustments to some of the corks in the key work to get a proper seal. I'd give it 5 stars if it had been ready to go out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: The clarinet played easily and had an accurate scale
customer_reviews.text: The clarinet played easily and had an accurate scale. I liked it very much but had trouble with the thumb rest - it has a nice adjustable range but my thumb needs to be higher up the instrument and I would have to customize it.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie A. Wade

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Waited to give review until well tested. Granddaughter's instructor says it is great. She was just chosen as most improved so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: MiMi

customer_reviews.title: You can't beat this model for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Yamaha dominates once again. This model is amazing and has such a beautiful solid tone to it. Very well made, they keys are VERY responsive and you can't beat the quality especially for the price. I've had my 650 for over almost 15 years now, just got her tuned up, oiled and pads replaced and she sounds amazing. I've played Selmer and Buffets models that are "comparable" to this model but there is no contest. I'd pick the 650 any day over the others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sounding and Looking!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it, has always wanted a good quality clarinet and this fit the bill. Quick shipping, too!
customer_reviews.author: L. Light

product_meta.title: Yamaha YCL-650 Bb Clarinet
product_meta.description: The Yamaha YCL-650U is a professional model clarinet that produces a consistent tone and precise intonation. The YCL650U features a grenadilla wood body with silver-plated key work. Its cylindrical bore design makes it extremely free blowing and teacher and student alike will enjoy the ease with which this clarinet tunes. The natural finish makes for a clarinet that looks as pleasing as it sounds! Complete with Yamaha 4C clarinet mouthpiece, case and Yamaha care accessories. Serious clarinetists will find inspiration in the tone and responsiveness of the YCL-650U Bb clarinets from the Yamaha Band & Orchestral Division. Featuring newly designed 65mm barrels-similar to Yamaha's acclaimed V Series-and durable "blue" steel spring material, the clarinets offer a beautiful natural finish on grenadilla bodies. The combination of aesthetic beauty and quick action promises an outstanding playing experience, as does the resonance chamber in the bell, which gives the instrument wonderful projection.
feature_bullets: The Yamaha YCL-650U is a professional model clarinet that produces a consistent tone and precise intonation
The YCL650U features a grenadilla wood body with silver-plated key work
Its cylindrical bore design makes it extremely free blowing and teacher and student alike will enjoy the ease with which this clarinet tunes
The natural finish makes for a clarinet that looks as pleasing as it sounds! Complete with Yamaha 4C clarinet mouthpiece, case and Yamaha care accessories
Serious clarinetists will find inspiration in the tone and responsiveness of the YCL-650U Bb clarinets from the Yamaha Band & Orchestral Division
